## **Load Libraries**
```{r}

library(class)

library(gmodels)

```

## **Import Data**
```{r}

UniversalBank <- read_csv("UniversalBank.csv")

```
*Data sourced from Canvas.*

<br>

## **Split Data**
```{r}

set.seed(123)
Index_Train <- createDataPartition(UniversalBank$`Personal Loan`, p=0.6, list = F)
Train <- UniversalBank[Index_Train,]
Valid <- UniversalBank[-Index_Train,]

```
